STATES THE NUMBNESS WENT AWAY ON ITS OWN, BUT WAS VERY CONCERNING. HE DENIES RIGHT SIDED WEAKNESS, DIPLOPIA, FACIAL DROOP, DIFFICULTY SPEAKING OR SWALLOWING. HE REPORTS NOCTURIA OF ABOUT 5 TIMES., HE DENIES DYSURIA. HE REPORTS H OF KIDNEY STONES, HX OF HTN FOR WHICH HE WAS TAKING TOPROL.
